charges.charge_disposition: Motion to Dismiss the Indictment is granted. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE-02/09/95 CT 1 (INFO) (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Adjudged: 46 mos. impr. and 3 yrs. supervised release upon the following special conditions: 1) The defendant shall refrain from any unlawful use of a controlled substance. The defendant shall submit to one drug test within 15 days of release from imprisonment and at least two drug tests thereafter, as directed by the Probation Office (mandatory condition). 2) That the defendant is prohibited from possessing any illegal and dangerous weapons. 4) That the defendant reside in a facility or care home where his basic necessities will be met, and where he will receive close supervision as directed by the Probation Office. 5) That the defendant participate in a mental health program at the discretion and direction of the Probation Office. Special Assessment: $50.00 Recommendation: A structural psychocosial rehabilitation program which would include education and job training components. Rochester, N.Y. if such placement is consistent with the above stated goal. (1s)
